content.question: Which of the following pairs of velocity-time graphs could correctly represent the motion of the block in Scenario <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and Scenario <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> ? Scenario <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>:Block Travels Down Incline Scenario <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>:Block Travels Up Incline A B C D

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
